statements: UPDATE Player SET player_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Player SET player_level = 10, last_login = '2023-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE guild_id = 3 AND player_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE Player SET player_name = 'Alice', player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Player SET player_score = player_score + 100, last_login = NOW() WHERE guild_id = 5 AND creation_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE players SET level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE friendships SET since = '2022-01-01' WHERE friendship_id = 5;
UPDATE players SET level = 10, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE friendships SET status = 'accepted' WHERE player1_id = 1 AND player2_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET level = 10 WHERE player_id = 'aaaa1111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
UPDATE game_sessions SET end_time = '2022-01-01 15:00:00' WHERE session_id = 1234;
UPDATE players SET level = 10, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_sessions SET end_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, player_id = '456e7890-12d3-45a6-789b-123456123456' WHERE session_id = 100;
UPDATE Players SET player_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Items SET item_value = 1000, item_type = 'Rare' WHERE item_id = 5;
UPDATE Players SET player_score = player_score + 100 WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE Items SET item_value = 20, item_name = 'Sword' WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_items SET quantity = 10 WHERE player_id = 2 AND item_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET player_score = player_score + 10, player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 101
UPDATE items SET item_type = 'Weapon' WHERE item_id = 201
